## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [alphaTest](./decentraland-ecs.basicmaterial.alphatest.md) |  | <code>number</code> | A number between 0 and 1. Any pixel with an alpha lower than this value will be shown as transparent. |
